net.sf.rcer.conn.preferences
Class PreferencesConnectionManager

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.rcer.conn.preferences.PreferencesConnectionManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPreferenceConstants
public class PreferencesConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPreferenceConstants

A singleton class that manages the connection data entries that are stored in the preferences.

Author:
vwegert

saveConnectionData

public void saveConnectionData(java.util.Collection<IConnectionData> connections)
Saves the connections to the preferences, replacing all existing connections. Note that the connection IDs are not guaranteed to be stable (although the registry will try to use the connection IDs provided).

Parameters:
connections -
